titles.title: Relating to a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Mr. Stearns moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Failed by recorded vote: 86 - 291, 3 Present (Roll no. 414).
DEBATE - By unanimous consent, the House proceeded with 20 minutes of debate on the resolution, equally divided and controlled.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 289 - 65, 7 Present (Roll no. 415).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/18/1997--Introduced. Instructs the Sergeant-at-Arms to remove former Representative Robert Dornan from the Hall of the House and rooms leading thereto and to prevent him from returning until the election contest concerning the 46th district of California is resolved.
